duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform computerized tomographic radiological procedures on patients and explain the examination procedure to them.
Review clinical data and prepare the patient for the examination, including analyzing anatomical structure and setting up equipment for the CT scan.
Administer intravenous contrast media and assist in performing complex sterile diagnostic procedures.
Ensure radiation protection principles are followed during imaging procedures and resolve any image exceptions in the PACS.
Demonstrate excellent team member standards of excellence and perform all documentation necessary for clinical and billing functions.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or G.E.D. equivalent. Registered with the American Registry of Radiologic Technology (ARRT) and the advanced registry in Computed Tomography (CT) or registry eligible. Healthcare Provider certification required.
